item.description:
I will be at the theater around 6, we should head in for seats at 6:30, movie time is 7:10. The movie is showing upstairs, so I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If you get there before me, please grab a table.

I have closed the poll on the movie for the 18th and it was a tie between Tron and How Do You Know. I was really expected to see a strong preference, one way or the other. So I am going to have to break the tie and I would rather see the romantic comedy.

After the movie, we will gather in the hallway to discuss the movie a bit, allow for restroom breaks and get a head count for those interested in going out for a bite to eat.

Release Date: December 17, 2010
Studio: Columbia Pictures (Sony)
Director: James L. Brooks
Screenwriter: James L. Brooks
Starring: Reese Witherspoon, Owen Wilson, Paul Rudd, Jack Nicholson
Genre: Comedy, Romance
MPAA Rating: PG-13 (for sexual content and some strong language)
Official Website:

http://www.sonypictur...

Plot Summary: A romantic comedy centered on the love triangle between professional softball player Lisa Jorgenson, a corporate executive, and a major-league pitcher.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Meetup Badge. If movie is upstairs, I will snag a table at the top of the escalator, If it is downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: How Do You Know?
